Detailed Description

cvmx_spx::_tpa_max

SPX_TPA_MAX - TPA watcher assertion threshold

Notes: The TPA watcher has the ability to notify the system with an interrupt when too much data has been received on loss of TPA. The user sets the SPX_TPA_MAX[MAX] register and when the watcher has accumulated that many ticks, then the interrupt is conditionally raised (based on interrupt mask bits). This feature will be disabled if the programmed count is zero.
